identity.name: E1 - The Anti-AI Designer
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Productivity (Linear) with Data Art (D3)
Emotion First: Every interaction feels 'snappy' and 'precise'
Content is King: Data density without clutter
Negative Space: Use margins to group logic, not just borders
Contrast: High contrast text, subtle borders

layout_strategies.companies_page: Toggle: Kanban Board (Card View) / Data Table (Table View)

custom_components.name: TaskCard
custom_components.description: Minimalist row item with checkbox, title, tags, and priority indicator. Hover reveals actions.

custom_components.name: JobCard
custom_components.description: Kanban-style card for job applications. Shows company logo (placeholder), role, date, and status badge.

custom_components.name: StatusBadge
custom_components.description: Pill-shaped badge with dot indicator. Color-coded based on status (Applied, Interview, Offer, Rejected).

custom_components.name: ViewToggle
custom_components.description: Segmented control to switch between Board and Table views.

custom_components.name: CommandMenu
custom_components.description: Global command palette (Cmd+K) to add tasks or jobs quickly.

Landing.structure: Hero Section (Value Prop) -> Feature Grid (Bento) -> CTA
Landing.vibe: Clean, mysterious, inviting. Use 'Tracing Beam' on feature cards.

Dashboard.structure: Greeting -> Stats Row (Tasks Done, Applications Active) -> Today's Tasks (List) -> Recent Activity

Tasks.structure: Filters/Search -> Task List (Grouped by Today, Tomorrow, Upcoming)

Companies.structure: Header (Stats + Add Button + View Toggle) -> Kanban Board OR Data Table

assets.instructions: Use Lucide React icons for all visual metaphors. No external images required unless user uploads company logos.

instructions_to_main_agent.general: Implement the 'Linear' aesthetic: Dark mode, subtle borders, high contrast text. Do not use gradients for backgrounds, only for subtle glows.
instructions_to_main_agent.tailwind_setup: Update tailwind.config.js to include the custom colors and animations defined in this JSON.
instructions_to_main_agent.routing: Ensure protected routes for Dashboard, Tasks, and Companies. Public route for Landing.
instructions_to_main_agent.state_management: Use React Context or a simple state manager for Task/Job data if backend is not ready, but structure it for API integration.
instructions_to_main_agent.interactions: All cards must have hover states (border color change or subtle lift). Buttons must have active states.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: You tend to converge toward generic, 'on distribution' outputs. In frontend design, this creates what users call the 'AI slop' aesthetic. Avoid this: make creative, distinctive frontends that surprise and delight.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
